Text: Convert all your digital photos to use with Flickr? or on your Website, sending in email, posting on auction sites and lots more. CoffeeCup PixConverter is the easy way to batch convert your digital photos for all your needs. Add photos one by one or convert an entire folder! You can Watermark your photos with text and graphics. There is even a snazzy thumbnail maker built-in for creating web photo albums in a snap! The best part is with the Built-In FTP Upload you can easily put your photos and Thumbnail pages on your Website with just one click !
